alert.note: Alert for Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:33PM CDT until June 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WADENA AND SOUTHEASTERN OTTER TAIL COUNTIES... At 833 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bluffton, or 37 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wadena, Ottertail Lake, New York Mills, Parkers Prairie, Battle Lake, Henning and Verndale. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 65 and 70. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
